meanings.definition: Remove (a hat or other item of clothing) as a gesture of respect or greeting.
meanings.sent1: He doffed his cap when he saw the elderly lady approaching.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman doffed his hat before entering the church.
meanings.sent3: The magician doffed his top hat, revealing a rabbit inside!
meanings.sent4: She doffed her scarf, letting it fall gracefully to the ground like a falling leaf.
meanings.sent5: As the king entered, the knight doffed his helmet, bowing deeply.

meanings.sent1: She doffed her coat before sitting down at the table.
meanings.sent2: The athlete doffed his jersey after the game.
meanings.sent3: The clown doffed his oversized shoes, causing laughter in the audience.
meanings.sent4: He doffed his gloves, revealing calloused hands from hard work.
meanings.sent5: Before jumping into the pool, she doffed her swim cap with a smile.
